name: Control Room Chaos
description:
In this game you will progressively face more and more tasks as time goes on, Things will quickly get Out-of-Control.

First up, there is the button, don't press the button, nothing good happens when you press the button.

Next is the crank, make sure you keep that bar low or things may quickly get overwhelming.

Third we have the buttons, press the flashing button to decrease the bar, but hit the wrong button and face consequences.

With the screen on, the next task is passwords, type the word or phrase that shows up on the screen.

Lastly, the monkey has found your location, be sure to shut him out when you hear him coming.

If you enjoyed the game, feel free to come by and say hi :

twitch.tv/iApollo

twitch.tv/DrSaltTV
